ghostPost.plaintext:
All content from Twitch works with Ghost automatically via our OEmbed
integration. All you have to do is paste a URL!

If you're already streaming to Twitch [https://twitch.tv], then you'll probably
want a way to embed past videos onto your site to build up a shareable archive.
Here's a quick guide for making Twitch and Ghost work together:

Copy the URL of the video
Grab the URL of the video you'd like to embed into your post or page

Paste it into the Ghost editor
When you paste it into the Ghost editor it'll be automatically transformed into
a rich embed of the video you selected

Publish your post
That's all there is to it! Ghost interacts with Twitch via their OEmbed
[https://oembed.com/]  API in order to retrieve all the correct settings
automatically and serve your video in the best way possible.

Here's an example of the end result:

Enjoy!
ghostPost.html:
All content from Twitch works with Ghost automatically via our OEmbed integration. All you have to do is paste a URL!

If you're already streaming to Twitch, then you'll probably want a way to embed past videos onto your site to build up a shareable archive. Here's a quick guide for making Twitch and Ghost work together:

Copy the URL of the video

Grab the URL of the video you'd like to embed into your post or page

Paste it into the Ghost editor

When you paste it into the Ghost editor it'll be automatically transformed into a rich embed of the video you selected

Publish your post

That's all there is to it! Ghost interacts with Twitch via their OEmbed API in order to retrieve all the correct settings automatically and serve your video in the best way possible.

Here's an example of the end result:

Enjoy!
